attributes.action: Scrap the proposed retrospective changes to car road fund licencing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 7 years ago had the public been aware of the rises in car tax for certain types of vehicle, the choice of car purchased may have been very different. To retrospectively tax these cars has rendered them worthless and who can afford to simply buy a new one?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
